name: White Negroni

ingredients.name: Lillet blanc, Cocchi Americano aperitivo or dry vermouth

preparation:
Suze, a French bitter aperitif made from gentian root, and Lillet blanc provide balance to each other and finish the flavor profile perfectly.

Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir for 15-20 seconds.

Strain into an Old Fashioned glass over ice.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
